pull.title: Added systemd .service file in order to help distributions integrate bitcoind
pull.body: Providing this .service file might be used as a guide by packagers and helps lowering the bar.

events.body:
Nice! This solves [at least part of] #4124.

Please also add a file to `doc/` that describes how to set up bitcoind as a service (so how to install this service file).
@aitorpazos Thanks for pushing this upstream to bitcoin instead of only to the @freicoin branch.
@laanwj You're right, I've just added doc related commits to this pull request. I almost forgot the actual instructions on how to install .service file :-S . @jtimon You're welcome.

ACK after squash into one commit.
(ignore the pulltester error, the build system or source code isn't even touched)

events.message: Added systemd .service file in order to help distributions integrate bitcoind.
